content.text:
# Draft:Marek Edward Antkowiak

Born September 14, 1956 in Wroclaw, Poland, Father ryszard Antkowiak (https://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ryszard_Antkowiak) and mother Barbara Antkowiak.
Emigrated to USA in 1985
Owner of R&D Microwaves LLC, Boonton NJ.
Inventor of Broadband non-directional tap coupler( aka Unequal power divider) used worldwide in antenna distribution network (DAS) for cellular communication.
patents:
7026888 Broadband non-directional tap coupler
8816792 High power, low-passive intermodulation microwave termination
9543631 Tapered airline directional coupler
10225024 Antenna w thermistor for remote fire monitoring
10348420 Antenna status remote monitoring system
Married to Jolanta Antkowiak
